title.rendered: Coinbase to list BRC-20 token ORDI and Worldcoin perpetual futures

content.rendered: Coinbase International Exchange has announced plans to launch perpetual futures contracts for Ordinals and Worldcoin tokens as soon as April 11.

excerpt.rendered: Coinbase International Exchange has announced plans to launch perpetual futures contracts for Ordinals and Worldcoin tokens as soon as April 11.
